p: In order to evaluate the relationship between the parameters, a principal component analysis (PCA) correlation circle was employed ( Figure 2). In the CONTROL, CHT, CHT 1:1 and CHT 1:3 groups there was a significant positive correlation between the transcription factor NF-Kb, oxidative stress markers and cardiac enzymes markers, indicating that myocardial ischemic injury was associated with inflammation and oxidative stress.
